txt.en: None have feasted on the remains of Scatha's larder with such fervour as a foul worm known to the dwarves as Stúrkvith the Bloated.
Mission: A Glutton in the Larder
'You've done well to put that beast down, [placeholder]! Let us return and report your success to Ausma!'
Your mission is to defeat the gluttonous rock-worm, Stúrkvith the Bloated, who now dwells in Scatha's Larder.
